text:
Many projects rely on java.home (ie: jboss-ws build/install ant files)
if you run these ant scripts they will give errors since java.home is being set to the users %JAVA_HOME%/jre.
Users that add "-Djava.home=%JAVA_HOME%" when running ant will get the following error:
can't open C:\Progra~1\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\lib\tzmappings.
ZoneInfo: C:\Progra~1\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\lib\zi\ZoneInfoMappings (The system cannot find the path specified)
ZoneInfo: C:\Progra~1\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\lib\zi\ZoneInfoMappings (The system cannot find the path specified)
(Note: JAVA_HOME is set to C:\Progra~1\Java\jdk1.6.0_04)
This is happening because ant assums the java.home will be the JRE.
